channel.title: usenet on Ross A. Baker
channel.description: Recent content in usenet on Ross A. Baker

item.description: On Usenet is a group called rec.sport.football.college. In its heyday a couple decades ago, a dramatic exit was punctuated with "adi-fuckin-os and unsubscribe." It became "AFO&U" for short, and the few who never AFO&U'ed still use the term. Programming community exits just don't have the same panache. #Usenet
